title: Gayle King Interview, Trump Acquittal, Sheryl Underwood, Kirk Douglas and more.
itunes:title: Gayle King Interview, Trump Acquittal, Sheryl Underwood, Kirk Douglas and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! We start the show off in Otis Redding style. The crew Ask Steve questions about humor, the presidency and more. Gayle King gets backlash for poor taste in questions during her interview with Lisa Leslie. She also gives us her response via Instagram. President Trump was acquitted and found not guilty of two articles. President Trump was impeached by the House and not by the Senate. Politics or Politricks? Sheryl Underwood has her opinion on Iowa and Bernie Sanders, plus she gives us her dates. Legendary actor Kirk Douglas dies at age 103. Viola Davis will play Michelle Obama in Showtime series. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve talks about about his morning routine and he makes a suggestion, plus more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
